DOC.brief_summary: The clinical study determines the safety and efficacy of Sitagliptin (MK0431) in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus who have inadequate glycemic control on diet/exercise therapy.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Sitagliptin in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Who Have Inadequate Glycemic Control on Diet/Exercise Therapy (0431-054)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Patients have type 2 diabetes mellitus on diet/exercise therapy Patients have type 1 diabetes mellitus
